DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effect food pharmacokinetics 10 mg single oral dose ZD4054 ( Zibotentan )
DOC.brief_title: Food Effect Study Single Dose ZD4054 ( Zibotentan )
DOC.criteria: BMI 18 30 kg/m2 Medical surgical history physical examination without clinically significant finding Able consume standard FDA specify highfat breakfast . Definite suspect personal history family history hypersensitivity drug endothelin antagonist ; ie , ambrisentan , artrasentan , sitaxsetan bosentan Medical diagnosis migraine attack 12 month prior Screening Use prescription medication within 2 week dose
